Authors: Utama D.N., Rizky M.B., Akbar M.F., Febrian I., Al-Ghani R.
Title: An Intelligent Model Development for Determining a Friendly Match Sparring-Partner in Football Game
Source title: Proceedings of 2018 International Conference on Information Management and Technology, ICIMTech 2018
Affiliations: Computer Science Department, Bina Nusantara University, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Computer Science, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Computer Science Universitas Mercu Buana, Jakarta, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Utama, D.N., Computer Science Department, Bina Nusantara University, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Computer Science, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Rizky, M.B., Computer Science Department, Bina Nusantara University, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Computer Science, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Akbar, M.F., Computer Science Department, Bina Nusantara University, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Computer Science, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Febrian, I., Computer Science Department, Bina Nusantara University, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Computer Science, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Al-Ghani, R., Computer Science Universitas Mercu Buana, Jakarta, Indonesia
Abstract: The statistical data coming from football match play an interesting phenomenon. They are possibly utilized by a football team to select a strategy to play. One strategy is to choice a proper sparring-partner in exercise. For fulfilling the purpose, the study with objective is to construct an intelligent model for choosing the most proper sparring-partner for friendly-match was academically performed. Here, two methods fuzzy logic and Euclidean distance are applied as fundamental method of model. The method fuzzy logic is operated by experts to justify nine selected parameters' urgency, and the method Euclidean distance is benefitted to calculate the fitness value of two soccer teams' combination. The object oriented method is employed to design the model. Finally, in the study result, the created model shows the list of the fittest sparring-partners of each team recorded. © 2018 IEEE.
Author Keywords: Euclidean distance; football game; fuzzy logic; intelligent model; object oriented; sparring-partner
